title: Adobe CJM ExperienceEvent - Message Execution Details
description: Message Execution details for the Adobe CJM ExperienceEvent.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: MessageExecution ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: The CJM activity originating this message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Message ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: The parent Message ID of a MessageExecution originating this message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Message Publication ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: The Publication ID of parent Message ID of a MessageExecution originating this message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: JourneyVersion Instance ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Identifier of the journey version instance, specific to one individual (uuid).

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Journey Version Node ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Identifier of the journey version node, triggering  the Message Execution.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Journey Action ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Journey Action ID, for which MessageExecution is triggered.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Message Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Message Type, whether it's marketing or transactional message
